TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Matadim, title = Matadim, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matadim} }

S.FORM: == Matadim == u sulit nu Hulam 馬太林部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hualien a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Matadim. u kasalumaluma' nu Matadim sa, 134 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 376 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 237 ku tademaw, pakalatu 63%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 139 ku tademaw, pakalatu 37%. u sausi nu cidekay a tademaw u Pangcah a niyazu' u kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 61%, Yuwatan(Bunun) 1%, zumazuma 2%. u pangca sa, u cidekay nu Taywan Incumin. tusa a bataan a mang ku tademaw. mueneng i Kalinku i Pusung atu i dadipasan nu bayu'an. satuuday a cidekay u Pangcah. u Sakizaya a tademaw izaw tu ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabulaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiluc tu tina niyazu'. nasulitan ni Liaw Socen. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin:

== Matadim == o solit no Holam 馬太林部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hoalien a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Matadim. o kasalomaloma' no Matadim sa, 134 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 376 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 237 ko tademaw, pakalato 63%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 139 ko tademaw, pakalato 37%. o saosi no cidekay a tademaw o Pangcah a niyazo' o kasabinacadan, Pangcah(Amis) 61%, Yowatan(Bonon) 1%, zomazoma 2%. o pangca sa, o cidekay no Taywan Incomin. tosa a bataan a mang ko tademaw. moeneng i Kalinko i Posong ato i dadipasan no bayo'an. satooday a cidekay o Pangcah. o Sakizaya a tademaw izaw to ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini, namabolaw i 1878 tayni milimek. siiloc to tina niyazo'. nasolitan ni Liaw Socen. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin:
